query.name: org.billingsschools.clever.sections
query.sql:
with first_day_or_today as ( select case when terms.firstday > sysdate then terms.firstday else sysdate end effdate from terms where terms.id = (extract(year from sysdate) + case when extract(month from sysdate) >= 7 then 1 else 0 end - 1991) * 100 and terms.schoolid = 0 and terms.isyearrec = 1 ), extra_teachers as ( select sectionteacher.sectionid, sectionteacher.allocation, schoolstaff.users_dcid, rank() over( partition by sectionteacher.sectionid order by sectionteacher.allocation desc, sectionteacher.teacherid) trank from sectionteacher left join schoolstaff on schoolstaff.id = sectionteacher.teacherid where sectionteacher.roleid != 21 and (select effdate from first_day_or_today) between sectionteacher.start_date and sectionteacher.end_date )
select case when sections.schoolid = 1258 and (select max(students.grade_level) from cc left join students on students.id = cc.studentid where cc.sectionid = sections.id group by cc.sectionid) <= 5 then 1439 when sections.schoolid = 1258 and (select max(students.grade_level) from cc left join students on students.id = cc.studentid where cc.sectionid = sections.id group by cc.sectionid) <= 8 then 1632 when sections.schoolid = 1258 then 1628 else sections.schoolid end school_id , sections.id section_id , schoolstaff.users_dcid teacher_id , extra_teachers_2.users_dcid teacher_2_id , extra_teachers_3.users_dcid teacher_3_id , extra_teachers_4.users_dcid teacher_4_id , to_char(floor(terms.id / 100 - 10)) || '-' || to_char(floor(terms.id / 100 - 9)) || case when floor(terms.id / 100) != terms.id / 100 then ' ' || terms.abbreviation end || case when sections.schoolid in (1250, 1251, 1628, 2100, 1853, 1631, 1632, 1851, 1645, 1646) then ' ' || sections.expression end || ' ' || courses.course_name || ' - ' || sections.id name , sections.section_number , '' grade , '' course_name -- need to be blank to use the name above , courses.course_number , '' course_description , substr(sections.expression, 0, instr(sections.expression, '(')-1) period , '' subject , terms.abbreviation term_name , to_char(terms.firstday, 'MM/DD/YYYY') term_start , to_char(terms.lastday, 'MM/DD/YYYY') term_end
from sections left join courses on courses.course_number = sections.course_number left join schools on schools.school_number = sections.schoolid left join terms on terms.id = sections.termid and terms.schoolid = sections.schoolid left join schoolstaff on schoolstaff.id = sections.teacher left join (select * from extra_teachers) extra_teachers_2 on extra_teachers_2.sectionid = sections.id and extra_teachers_2.trank = 1 left join (select * from extra_teachers) extra_teachers_3 on extra_teachers_3.sectionid = sections.id and extra_teachers_3.trank = 2 left join (select * from extra_teachers) extra_teachers_4 on extra_teachers_4.sectionid = sections.id and extra_teachers_4.trank = 3
where sections.schoolid not in (0, 999999, 6200, 1267, 1834, 79438) and sections.course_number not in ('NC100', 'NC101', 'NC107', 'PREMTWTH') and terms.firstday <= (select effdate + 5 from first_day_or_today) and terms.lastday > (select effdate - 5 from first_day_or_today) and (select count(1) from cc where sectionid = sections.id) > 0 and ( ( sections.external_expression not like 'OA%' and sections.external_expression not like 'OL%' ) or sections.course_number in ('IN100','NC200') -- Interventions )
